name: Yum, Fireflies!
description:
You play as a frog chilling in a swamp and trying to eat as much as he can.

Catch the fireflies to feed him and avoid missing your targets so you don't get him killed!

Controls:

  • Left mouse button to catch

Tips:

  • Try to catch the fly that the frog is looking at to get double points!
  • Bigger flies are slower and easier to catch so try catching them before the small ones
  • Each fly you eat will regenerate a bit of your health so take your time to choose your next catch when you're low on hp

Credits:

  • Game by Houcine Chelbi
  • Environment inspired by an artwork from Cyril Corallo
  • Music by Arulo

Made with Godot Engine
